### Load in Specific Packages
```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(here)
library(lemon)
library(kableExtra)
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape())
library(hexbin)
library(data.table)
library(formattable)
```

### Load in the data 
```{r}
cancerReg <- read.csv("C:\\Users\\romin\\ToyRepo\\Models\\cancerReg.csv") 
```


### Remove Uncessary Data for Analysis
```{r}
cancerReg <- cancerReg %>% select(-area_type,-period,-type_definition,-indicator, -upper_confidence_interval, -lower_confidence_interval)
cancerReg
```

### Display Summary of All Data
```{r}

ggplot(cancerReg,aes(x=year, y= numerator, col=area_name)) + geom_line() + geom_point()
``` 

### Summary Table of Data Within Graph 
```{r}
customGreen0 = "#DeF7E9"

customGreen = "#71CA97"

customRed = "#ff7f7f"

healthBoard <- cancerReg %>%
    filter(area_name %in% c(
        "NHS Ayrshire & Arran", "NHS Borders", "NHS Dumfries & Galloway",
        "NHS Forth Valley", "NHS Grampian", "NHS Highland",
        "NHS Lothian", "NHS Orkney", "NHS Shetland",
        "NHS Western Isles"
    )) %>%
    filter(year %in% 2003:2021)


healthBoard



```
